data.title: STEP Market
data.meta_description: Official website for The Short-Term European Paper (STEP) initiative. It aims to foster the integration of the European markets for short-term paper through the convergence of market standards and practices.
data.text: STEP takes reasonable measures to ensure the quality and accuracy of the information on this Website. However, STEP cannot be held liable in any way for the inaccuracy or incompleteness of any information that is available on or through this Website. In addition, none of the Parties can in any way be held liable or responsible for the content of any Website linked to this Website.
